quirks.description: Obsessively collects unusual items (buttons, stones, stories, etc.)
Frequently quotes from books, plays, or poetry
Has an unusual fear of common animals
Speaks to an inanimate object as if it can respond
Compulsively counts objects, steps, or other things
Refuses to sit down, always stands
Always snacking or eating something
Frequently forgets names, faces, or recent events
Claims to have prophetic dreams and shares them
Accompanied by an unusual animal companion
Carries and frequently touches a lucky charm
Always greets people the exact same unusual way
Speaks in rhymes or tries to
Won't shake hands or touch others
Constantly mentions important people they know
Always has a better story than yours
Obsessed with order, symmetry, or perfection
Constantly checking the time or position of the sun
Tells terrible jokes and laughs at them
Consistently mispronounces certain common words
Has an accent from a distant or unusual region
Believes in elaborate conspiracy theories
Wants to bet on everything
Constantly whistles the same few tunes
Apologizes excessively for everything
Always gets people's names wrong
Constantly comments on and predicts weather
Comments on everyone's clothing and appearance
Claims to have seen mythical creatures others doubt
Often says the opposite of what they mean
Refers to themselves in the third person
Carries a precious item they constantly worry about
Offers to tell fortunes or read palms
Constantly offers unsolicited medical or health advice
Takes long, dramatic pauses while speaking
